Name: ds114
ReferencesAndLinks: A test-retest fMRI dataset for motor, language and spatial attention functions, http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3641991/
Description:
This is just a subset of the original ds000114 distributed by openfmri (///openfmri/ds000114 on datalad) with FreeSurfer surfaces pre-computed. Each time I see Satra he looks younger.
He is younger.  He a youngin’.
Named benjamin button
'Baby Face Ghosh' they call ‘im!
'Cherub Cheeks SG' they call ‘im!
- The Elders
